website_summaries.verdict: A very good kit for first-time drivers and those needing basic roadside safety items in a compact storage bag, but most will find themselves buying extras.
pros: Included “gripper” gloves are a great addition, owners report, as are extra zip ties
8-foot jumper cable is adequate in a pinch
Storage case’s super-compact size makes it easy to carry along
cons: Many users recommend upgrading jumper cables to a longer, higher-gauge set
Flashlight is barely adequate and sometimes arrives defective
Towing strap is weak – not rated for larger vehicles

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE READ. Actual use!
customer_reviews.text: Today was one of the worst blizzards in CO springs area. I'm sure many of the 5 star reviews are from people that never used these items. While on the road today I pulled up to a car that was stuck in the snow. I thought, hey I'll just use that handy tow cable I bought! I attached it on both ends to a tow point and got back in. On the first light pull the tow strap snapped immediately. It is cheap garbage. This is pathetic they are actually selling this to people that would need it in an emergency. I'm sure the rest of the equipment is just as cheap. DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Solid Roadside Emergency Kit (with a few tweaks)
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 2 of these for my daughters as they recently took cars to college. The kit contains a reasonably complete set of decent quality materials needed for a roadside emergency. I supplemented the kit with 50' of paracord, 2 heavy duty garbage bags, 6-in-1 screwdriver, 4-in-1 mini screwdriver, a small roll of duct tape, and a LED headlamp. The multi-tool was too flimsy for my liking, so replaced it with a Stanley multi-tool. I'll probably buy a couple of more for other cars and make the same additions and substitutions.
customer_reviews.author: T. Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Jumper cable plastic cover smoked and melted on first use.
customer_reviews.text: The jumper cable cable plastic cover smoked and melted. It failed to jump start my mini van. We ditched it before it caught fire. Dangerous garbage. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Trader John

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the day that I might just need it... Gratefully, I have not used it yet. It's the mid-range kit, not the cheapest nor the most expensive. The price-point along with the stuff included were the two main factors leading me to purchase. It should be noted that the cables are heavy duty and it does come with hazard road signs. I coupled this package with LED road flares. I'm very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Aftab

customer_reviews.title: Feel safe now
customer_reviews.text: It has everything in it that you might need on the road. Constantly driving to Gunnison co and back to denver and this will make me feel safe in the snow storms. You dont really need to get anything else if you get this. Was really sturdy the only thing is it may take me a while to find the one thing I need as it isnt “organizable.” But I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Just wish the bag was bigger
customer_reviews.text: I really wish the bag was bigger so that I could add more of my own items. The kit itself is pretty well prepared and covers most roadside emergency needs. I am moving to the mountains and will have to be making the 45 mile round trip back to the city frequently. This little kit, along with some additions, i.e., fuses, a fuse puller, small socket wrench set, screwdriver set, etc. will give me a bit of peace of mind, particularly in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: ReeseR

customer_reviews.title: Kit arrived with 3 missing items
customer_reviews.text: When the kit arrived, I started unpacking everything. I quickly realized I was missing 5 zip ties, 2 bungee cords, and the reflective safety vest promised in the kit. When I emailed the customer service department referenced in my package, my email immediately bounced back as undeliverable. I am returning the first package and ordering a replacement in hopes that the second kit will arrive with all the promised pieces. Apart from this issue, the quality of materials was exactly what I was expecting - not high-end but definitely acceptable based on the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget D

customer_reviews.title: and carrying bag is sturdy and not to big The seller also sent an ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received Always Prepared 65- Piece Roadside Assistance Emergency Kit! A must have kit for your vehicle, a piece of mind. This kit contains everything described, and the products seem to be of high quality. The kit is put together very well, and carrying bag is sturdy and not to big The seller also sent an emergency e Book you can download on your phone. So far, I am very satisfied with this purchase and highly recommended. The seller takes pride in their customers and makes sure they are satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Maria. Z.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the money! Bought it for my 18 year old’s car!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to put in my son’s car. He will be commuting to college and I wanted to make sure he was safe. This product offers everything a driver might need if they broke down on the side of the road. The equipment was well made and my only complaint is that I wish the medical equipment had a separate (first aid) bag, it comes in a zip lock bag. It is a small complaint and I was able to grab a bag from the dollar store to put the medical supplies in. I think this product is a great!
customer_reviews.author: NJSilva

customer_reviews.title: Sarah's Source 65-piece Emergency Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent car emergency kit, contains just about anything you might need, comes in a very nice sturdy case and even contains a LED flashlight that doesn't require batteries. It appears that Sarah's Source put a lot of thought into this product and I would definitely recommend it..
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this kit. It has most things I wouldn't have thought of putting in my car. I mainly purchased this for the jumper cables, but figured I'd get the kit. Some reviews showed a broken cable so I was skeptical, however, mine looks fine. I haven't gotten a chance to use it though. I also found the customer service to be exceptional, they reached out to me with emails regarding my purchase and making sure that I was satisfied. I really don't understand the negative reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Tam

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any new driver!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is amazing for any vehicle, but it is a must for new drivers. As a parent it will give you some peace of mind knowing they will have what they need and be prepared if anything should happen. My husband was impressed with everything that came in this kit and the fact that it is so compact is another plus! He was so excited to show our son everything and I think he wanted to keep the self powered hand crank flashlight for himself!! Great product, thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MaeRod

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and isn't missing anything.
customer_reviews.text: As someone who just purchased a car and is not very experienced with them, I'm very happy I bought this. It's is of great quality (the bag is not cheap or flimsy) and has everything that is listed in the description. I feel very safe having everything in one bag, ready to (hopefully never) be used! I think this would be a great gift for someone!
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would be a great thing to have handy (teenagers never think they will ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a gift for a brand new driver. Thought it would be a great thing to have handy (teenagers never think they will need this stuff). Loved how well packed and compact everything was in the handy carry bag. It zips closed and keeps everything together and fits nicely int he trunk for those unexpected emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Mac13mug

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price, sure you could assemble your own kit of higher quality items, but you would spend double or triple the price. Overall appears to be a good mix of useful items that will serve their purpose. It fit perfectly in the rear under deck cargo area in a 2016 traverse, I did remove the stiffening board from the bottom of the bag though.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Riess

customer_reviews.title: Good Emergency Auto Kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my two daughters. I just wanted them to have some essential tools like a tow rope, jumper cables and flashlights in case their cars broke down. There is no water or food, and that is okay. They should pack those items separately themselves, especially if they are going out of town.
customer_reviews.author: M. Boring

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, high quality, excellent price, emergency kit.
customer_reviews.text: Truly pleased with this purchase. We bought two of these bags, for our vehicles and we love them. They are sturdy, well made bags, they are filled with anything you could need for an emergency bag. The price can't be beaten for all the stuff you received. The shipping was on time, we have had no issues with our purchase and we will be buying another and also recommending it to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Roadside Assistance Kit With a Difference
customer_reviews.text: This is one purchase I am quite pleased with. Delivery was as scheduled and the items come in a nice, compact bag that sits neatly in the boot. The package has an assortment of vital items, plus some extras I would never have thought of including in a car emergency kit. Only thing is there was 1 Bungee Chord instead of 3 and 10 Cable Ties instead of 15. Other than that this is well worth your money. I haven't used any items yet (thankfully :-) other than the tyre pressure gauge. However, I am confident in the quality of all the items in the kit and gladly recommend it. Thank you! Lola.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Akwabi

customer_reviews.title: Just the items that I thought a young adult should have in their first good car. All was as adverted
customer_reviews.text: This was for my Granddaughter to go with her air pump. Just the items that I thought a young adult should have in their first good car. All was as adverted. A good basic first aid for most automobile problems. I also purchased her a tool kit to go with it. The simple basics to take care of minor problems or so a friend could.
customer_reviews.author: ampeyton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the kit, should cover most basic needs on the road. I chose it mainly for the reflective vest and triangle. Visibility is a big deal when you’re out on the side of the highway. I can’t really comment on the quality during use but from first appearances it looks like everything should holdup. For the price I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: K Bailey``````

customer_reviews.title: This product is way beyond the best value for my money
customer_reviews.text: This product is way beyond the best value for my money. It comes well packaged and easy to just place in my car straight from the box. I hope that I will never have to use it (would prefer to not be in an accident 😊) but I feel much safer knowing that I have it just in case, because more than likely, I will need it someday. I bought one for both my husband and myself!
customer_reviews.author: Haleigh G.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you may need
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter as a new driver. There is so much stuff in there - she had a blast just pulling everything out and oojing and awwing over each piece (it was then a bit difficult to get it all back in, but we managed). It has some really cool stuff in it that your cheaper basic bags won't have.
customer_reviews.author: Beachgal

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my grandson's new car. He got a ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandson's new car. He got a kick out of some of the items, as specially the poncho. Kids out on the road though need all the protection that they can get despite their cell phones and iPads. He is the most precious thing to me on earth and every little bit helps
customer_reviews.author: Anne Joe

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with this kit.
customer_reviews.text: Don't pass this up. This roadside kit is a MUST HAVE for everybody. Love this. It is for my granddaughter for Christmas. It has just about everything in it and it is not cheap stuff. Very happy and have suggested to someone else she order a couple of these too. Thank you and Merry Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: D. Perry

customer_reviews.title: We always keep emergency kits in our vehicles. Recently ...
customer_reviews.text: We always keep emergency kits in our vehicles. Recently my husband bought a new truck and I needed a different kind of kit. The bag is the primary reason I selected this kit over others. It fits perfectly under the back seats and doesn't shift around as much as our other kits that don't all come in one bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Lanise Burke

customer_reviews.title: If you have a car, you need this product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. She has 2 l children and is in the car all the time, both highway and city driving. She didn't even have jumper cables. Her husband travels and is never available if she has car trouble of any kind. I don't think he even knows how to change a tire. Every woman needs this for sure!
customer_reviews.author: BJI

customer_reviews.title: Great quality roadside emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this emergency roadside kit for my niece who will be starting college out of state next summer and will be putting on a lot of miles with her vehicle. I researched a lot of emergency kits and by far this is the most complete kit. I feel confident knowing she will have everything she needs if the need arises. She loves that it's compact. I would definitely purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: F. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: This is an affordable roadside emergency kit consisting of high quality items you need in any number of different roadside emergencies! The jumper cables are hefty and a good length unlike some which are a struggle to stretch from one car engine to another. Everything from the reflective triangles to the protective gloves are good quality and should last for years. All items come in a sturdy canvas bag with reinforced handles.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for our daughter who recently started driving, as something to keep in the car that hopefully she would never need. This kit is hefty and compact and includes just about anything that I'd imagine she would need. Great value and even greater piece of mind!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Reader

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great as well
customer_reviews.text: As a firefighter on the go, I pair this with my first aid kit and various other tools! You never know when you'll need or when you'll come by someone else who needs help! The quality is great as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan V.

customer_reviews.title: A must !
customer_reviews.text: I know there is Aaa and cell phones but my son is a first time driver and being a mom it makes me feel a little better knowing he has this kit in his car . It comes with everything !!!! And it is good quality . And he loved it when I gave it to him . Better safe then sorry !
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely put together!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a car our son-in-law & daughter will be using this summer, and for our grandson to be learning to drive in. It is a gift for them, as they have been overseas & we wanted to have the car ready to use when they arrive. Thought this would be practical for them to have & use if needed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Fredricks

customer_reviews.title: ... replaced some stuff in it but overall it's a good value. I also took everything out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I replaced some stuff in it but overall it's a good value. I also took everything out of the bag and put it in the tray storage in my wrangler because the bag smelled and the gloves inside did as well so I took them out of the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: This is the best packed emergency kit I have ever encountered
customer_reviews.text: This is the best packed emergency kit I have ever encountered. It is full of everything one might need in case of the unexpected. It's organized well. I strongly encourage all to purchase. The one item that should probably be included is a mini flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Franqui

customer_reviews.title: Essential for Every Car
customer_reviews.text: Great kit! I just went on a road trip with my sister and wanted to have something in the car for those just in case moments. So glad nothing bad happened on our trip but I am seriously glad I made this purchase. Who knows down the road when I might need something. I have already used the flashlight multiple times. Wonderful product and I think everyone should have one of these in their cars no matter what.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It has everything he might need in an emergency - and I feel he will be better protected if he has this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friend's son who just got a car. It has everything he might need in an emergency - and I feel he will be better protected if he has this. I hope he never needs to use it - but it is a comprehensive set of items that would be useful in any emergency situation.
customer_reviews.author: RA12

customer_reviews.title: Always be prepared
customer_reviews.text: A must have in your car in case of emgencies. Upon looking through various roadside kits I wanted one that included a little bit of everything. I think I might have found it. There are a few things I might change out in kit, but overall I satisfied with what's included.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Cheah

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 16 year old step daughter for her first car. I was very pleasantly surprised by the number of things included, way more than I would have thought of on my own. I plan to get one for the rest of my kids when they start driving.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Novellino

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for this kit. It is well put together and the items it contains are well thought out. The size is nice and compact, with enough room to add some personal items of my own, if needed. The only suggestion I would add is to maybe add some hand warmers. Not really emergency type item but could be used when changing a tire in the winter. You have the gloves, which are a nice, but just throwing it out there as a possible viable inexpensive option. All in all, great product and I will recommend this to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits very neat and organized in my trunk. It was well packaged and arrived on time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Rapsey

customer_reviews.title: they had great recommendations and provided a list of items to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently was taking an online defensive driving course to lower my insurance costs. Towards the end of the online course, they had great recommendations and provided a list of items to keep in your care for being prepared "in case of an emergency'". I decided to look on Amazon and found your roadside emergency kit. I was really impressed with what was in the kit, so I ordered it. I then realized I needed to get someone a gift that is difficult to buy for and immediately ordered a 2nd kit. I loved the kit as did the person I gave the gift/kit to.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit!
customer_reviews.text: Received my Roadside Kit today, and am very happy!! Nice sturdy bag, and it's packed with necessary and quality items. Quick shipping & wonderful communication with seller... Highly recommend product for emergency purposes, with room to add on more stuff if needed....
customer_reviews.author: Breesan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: One gift you hope never gets opened but glad to give it to our newest driver.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M.

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter who is a new driver and just purchased her first vehicle. This kit far exceeded my expectations and gives me further comfort and peace of mind as she continues to gain driving experience.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sassani

customer_reviews.title: It’s like Mary Poppins bag
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s great, has a bunch of stuff in it that would be useful in a bad situation. I just kept pulling things out that I didn’t think would even fit in the bag. My personal favorite item in the bag is the glow stick.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Nice little set for the $$ and in a small ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice little set for the $$ and in a small compact case, easily fits in car. Not a huge bulky item. I bought these for Christmas gifts for my two kids in their 20's and it will give me some ease knowing they have this item in their car.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful.
customer_reviews.text: A comprehensive kit for travel emergencies. I would recommend putting the seat belt cutter/glass breaker in your center console or glove box. Adding some snacks and liquid meals before a trip would help on any long emergency. I likrd this so much I bought one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Gahn Kissell

customer_reviews.title: but it all looks pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is made in China. Granted, the only thing I've used yet is the flashlight, which works in close range, but it all looks pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: JennaShea

customer_reviews.title: OK Roadside Kit
customer_reviews.text: The kit seems ok; many of the items are pretty cheaply made, but the important items seem nice. The storage case keeps everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Great for any car!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a new driver or one headed off to college out of town!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Helsel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our roadtrip and just in case!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our roadtrip. Thankfully we didn't need to use anything but had we needed to this kit provided it all! We keep it in the car in case of emergencies and it is nice to have peace of mind
customer_reviews.author: M. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully I'll never have to use it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great package with virtually everything you need to be prepared on the road. All of the contents are exactly as described and seem to be great quality. The only sub par item is the motor-powered flashlight: which is functional, but impractical. But it's also one of the least important items, seeing as I haven't used anything but my phone as a flashlight in years. Everything fits easily into the bag without requiring a PHD in geometry to make the zipper close, plus there is room for a few extra items I wanted to keep in there.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and comprehensive kit!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value and comprehensive emergency kit for my new car! This compact bag contains everything it advertised, and the tools and products are high quality. Hopefully I'll never need them, but very glad to have such a great kit at such a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G. Chapman, Author

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy. Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Well packed. Nice carrier. The gift recipients were amazed at how many items were in the set.
customer_reviews.author: Julia J

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy kit. I needed something small with basic "just in case" items. I love the seatbelt cutter/window breaker and the poncho, I live in Az, so a monsoon storm can come out of nowhere. I added a hammer and duct tape and put this with my first aide kit and fire extinguisher. I also purchased one for my mother-in-law, she does alot of travelling by herself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: It was purchased as a gift for my niece who just got her license. She requested a safety kit for her car. I purchased one at a local store and did not like it at all. I found this kit which appeared to be of better quality plus it had more safety objects inside. I hope my niece doesn't have to use it but just in case of emergency, she will be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Minello

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This emergency kit has all but one thing that i was looking for. I am especially pleased that it came with a window breaker and seat belt cutter as well as jumper cables. The only thing i wish it had was a tire pressure gauge, but i am still happy with my purchase nonetheless. It was smaller than i expected and came in a nice leather bag, it was more affordable than many of the other kits i have looked at. I hope i never have to use any of it, but if i do i am sure i will be happy with the outcome. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: My grandson just got his license and first car. Order this for him for "just in case". Hope he'll never have to use all of it, but if he does I know that he has it. I had read the reviews before ordering and they were correct. Very good quality and heavy duty. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great quality in the package.
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you need in there for emergencies. Glad I have it in my car. I feel very prepared for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great for Emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Great to have in an emergency. This was purchased for my daughter's car and has come in handy. This is a good product to have with you in an emergency. Everything seen is what is in the duffle.
customer_reviews.author: Stan C

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for truck. Fits in a small place and easy to transfer from one car to another if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jesi Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Has everything we may need in case of an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had to use any of it yet but I'm a lot more comfortable on the road knowing that I have this kit ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything I could possibly need in a Roadside emergency; from jumper cables to a first aid kit. I haven't had to use any of it yet but I'm a lot more comfortable on the road knowing that I have this kit in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Dogmama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect. Got it as a gift for my daughter who just started driving
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Missing one item
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly the only thing that was missing were the zip ties which I was kind of disappointed about because I did pay 50$ for a complete kit and those could really come in handy but rather than deal with the hassle of returning the whole kit for a complete one I guess I’ll just go without them. Other than that I do like it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hawley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for first fathers day gift. He just recently got his first car. this makes me feel better for him to have in his car for any type of emergency big or small.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I love this Product, its nice to know that I have just in case of any emergencies!
customer_reviews.author: Nuyorican

customer_reviews.title: Safety first
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandsons car.Has everything you need in an emergency
customer_reviews.author: Emma Morales

customer_reviews.title: Must have for new drivers
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my teenage daughter who got a car for Christmas. It has everything that you could want and everything is if good quality! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great roadside assistance kit! Very happy with my purchase and the communication and further discounts from the seller. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: P. Von Bargen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great size and has everything you would ever need. Haven't needed to use it yet but puts my mind at ease that it's with me wherever I go. Bag is of good quality and small enough to put behind a seat or in the corner of a trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: great equipment that's way over the price of the emergency ...
customer_reviews.text: It has everything it said it has and surprisingly all in a small cozy bag, great equipment that's way over the price of the emergency kit itself which I like. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: A101C

customer_reviews.title: Cables went up in smoke.
customer_reviews.text: The jumper cables...what I would consider as a critical component of this purchase caught on fire the first time I used them. Plastic melted right off the cables and started smoking.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi K Morris

customer_reviews.title: The flashlight is pretty cool 🔦
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very compact, and I was surprised so much fit in it. I don't know if I'll ever use all of the things that came in this bag, but its super handy to just KNOW I've got it just incase. After you take some of the packaging off of the items inside, there's more than enough room to put in other things you may feel are necessary to have just incase. Over all, totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: newsubstance

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my 22 year old daughter for her vehicle so she'd have safety necessities while driving. Thanks a lot for making a great, comprehensive roadside safety kit! Susan
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great roadside bag
customer_reviews.text: Great roadside bag. Has everything you will need on case of a roadside emergency. Bought one for my wife and son.
customer_reviews.author: Andria M. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Lots of great stuff
customer_reviews.text: In a compact bag. Everything you might need if you break down!
customer_reviews.author: Working Mom

customer_reviews.title: Already used this kit twice!! Should've purchased sooner
customer_reviews.text: There's so many things in this kit. Most kits are focused on first aid and that's why it shows it has more items. I was looking for a good road side kit bc I have a first aid kit separately. All items are quality and I've already needed things from it twice! I should've purchased it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Defective tire pressure gauge
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 kits, 1 for my car and the other for my wife's car. One set had a defective tire pressure gauge, it broke into several parts when used the first time, keeping our fingers crossed for any other defective items in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: ARNEL CANETE

customer_reviews.title: Essential emergency kit for your car
customer_reviews.text: I've had other emergency kits for the car, but unlike those, this one is really packed with essential items, and all of the items fit into a small rectangular bag, not much bigger than a loaf of bread. I purchased this for our daughter who began driving recently. It is better to have one, and not need it, than need one and not have it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: Clearly something everyone should have in their vehicle. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Clearly something everyone should have in their vehicle. I just got a new SUV and wanted to start new with all of the proper safety necessities.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for offering a needed and fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I purchased this roadside emergency kit. It is compact, yet has everything needed during an emergency: tools, jumper cables, reflective triangles, and first aid supplies. Including a whistle in the kit was an excellent idea, something I don't often see in these types of kits. The customer service is also great; very attentive and focused on customer satisfaction. I am happy with my purchase, and would recommend this product, and business, to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Stanford

customer_reviews.title: then these jumper cables are useless.
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute set, but when it comes to car repair I would prefer functional to cute. My car died and I tried to use the jumper cables provided with this kit. They were too short. They are only about 6 feet long, so if you car dies in an awkward location, where another car can't pull up to it hood to hood, then these jumper cables are useless.
customer_reviews.author: K. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Bleh. OK for the money, but not high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the new car's emergency kit. It came and I like it for the price. All of the products are cheaply made Chinese products. I couldn't use the (plastic!) tire pressure gauge or the all in one tool (the knife is less sharp than a butter knife and is SOOOOOO cheaply made). For the money, it's good. I wouldn't buy it again and have since replaced several of the items with higher quality items (all-in-one tool, flashlight, tire pressure gauge and safety vest). Seller shipped on time and packaged well. And again, it was cheap, so I didn't expect all American made (but at least ONE item from America would have been nice....)
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Saftey!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't needed to use anything yet but it's all great to have!
customer_reviews.author: Brian smith

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully Kit!
customer_reviews.text: Great little safety kit I keep I'm the trunk of my car. I haven't had to use any of the items yet but I like to always be prepared just in case of an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Symone

customer_reviews.title: It never hurts to be prepared!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this product and everything it has to offer! The amount of what is included, as well as the quality of everything, is top notch! I believe that this is an essential item for everyone out on the roads.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit..
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a new car for the family and what let me to this kit was that it didn't take much space in the trunk considering all the pieces it comes with. Winter time is coming and i need to be prepared for it...Great Kit and Great Price.
customer_reviews.author: Jose L. Paez

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, dirty gloves though....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband and I. Living in Indiana you never know what the weathers going to be like. It had all the items in it, but I was disappointed because when we received it both of the gloves were dirty like they have been used. Everything else was unopened. Not sure what happened.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Received it promptly and as described. Thought it was going to be a large bag. It's nice and compact- fits in my car perfectly. I also like that I can take everything out of the bag and put it back in without it being a game of Tetris. Great price as well. I will be getting one for every car we own!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Face

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for each grandson as they got their first car. Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: gatorgirl

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Nice and handy. Couldn't believe how much stuff they fit in a little bag
customer_reviews.author: JaydenB

customer_reviews.title: Wide range of helpful car accessories in one bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son’s new car to carry in the trunk. Has turned out to be of great use to him and his friends.
customer_reviews.author: Goodwyfe

customer_reviews.title: Six Stars!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: A great starter bag of an emergency assistance. this is perfect for the collage kid on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Everything you would need when you on the road.
customer_reviews.text: It so easy to install and it work out of the box
customer_reviews.author: David Le

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I orderd this for my daughter before she headed off to college. She now has a complete kit in her car if she ever needs one. I even ordered another for myself, because there was so much in this kit!
customer_reviews.author: LD_inTexas

customer_reviews.title: Looks like everything I may need for an emergency
customer_reviews.text: Looks like everything I may need for an emergency. Package seems like the right size where its not too big or too small. Doesn't take a lot of space in the truck. Having had to use anything yet but that's a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: gl9erfan

customer_reviews.title: Great for my sons car
customer_reviews.text: Great for my sons car. Hes a new driver, and I wanted to make sure that he had everything necessary in case of an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Pandi

customer_reviews.title: A bit cheap
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the cheap side but I also hope to never need it
customer_reviews.author: Chad H

customer_reviews.title: It is well worth the money and it makes a great gift for young people who just got their first ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a 'must have' roadside kit for every vehicle. I was pleasantly surprised to see all the important items one would need in an emergency. It is well worth the money and it makes a great gift for young people who just got their first vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Linderella

product_meta.title: Always Prepared Premium 125 Piece Roadside Emergency Assistance Kit with Jumper Cables - All-in-One Auto, Visibility, Safety, and First Aid Essentials
feature_bullets: ESSENTIAL ROAD SAFETY KIT – Always feel protected and secure while driving in your car with our 125-piece premium roadside assistance emergency kit that you can count on when you need immediate help on the road.

ALL-IN-ONE SOLUTION – Small, organized, and useful in a variety of road emergency situations, this exceptional car roadside assistance kit comes in a compact bag that can easily fit in your vehicle’s trunk, backseat, or spare tire compartment.

LIFE-SAVING BATTERY & CABLES – Made of 8-gauge copper wire, our emergency car kit includes handy jumper cables to help get your car working again in flash if you ever need a boost whether in the summer or winter.

GIFT FOR FIRST-TIME CAR OWNERS – The ideal gift for anyone in search of a new car, our road emergency kit is perfect for young new drivers, those buying a used or new car, and those wanting a little extra piece of safety and security in their vehicles.

EMERGENCY ITEMS – Our car emergency road kit includes special and standard items including battery booster cables, reflective safety vest and warning triangle, self-powered flashlight, 2 light sticks, emergency rain poncho and mylar blanket, and a whistle.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars575 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
